CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper January 18, 1947, pg. 9, reads: "[illegible] Hostesses - Among the charming hostesses who took care... [ill.] annual membership tea given by the Beauty Shop... [ill.] Sunday at the Community Music Center on Centre... [ill.] Helen Kendrick, Jean Mason, Thelma Johnson... [ill.] Wall. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Helen Kendrick, Jean Mason, Thelma Johnson, and Ms. Wall posed in interior with oriental rugs and piano, possibly in Community Music Center
